marketing.workInProgress: This page is still a work in progress - Follow along on GitHub
marketing.recruitmentSteps: All Recruitment Steps in One Place: Make life easier for both organizations and job seekers by centralizing recruitment processes.
marketing.featureDescription: Embloy serves as the bridge connecting organizations with prospective job seekers. Functioning as a middleware solution customized for the digital age, explore how Embloy can enhance your hiring process:
marketing.smartHiringDescription: 10x Faster HR processes due to automation.
marketing.endToEndRecruitmentDescription: Eliminate the need for lengthy email and phone exchanges.
marketing.easyToIntegrateDescription: Made for effortless, unsupervised onboarding of new stakeholders.
marketing.oneClickToApplyDescription: Enjoy the convenience of a single platform, where everything is just a click away.
marketing.xPlatformDescription: Highly modular system, accessible on web, iOS, and Android, allows for custom integrations through API
marketing.socialToolsDescription: Seamless integration into today's social media landscape for unparalleled engagement with job seekers.
marketing.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.
marketing.openSourceDescription: Embloy is open source and powered by open source software.
marketing.copyright: Copyright © 2024 Embloy, GbR. The source code is available on

pricing.basicSubscriptionForProviders: Job providers can request a basic subscription for an application if they want to verify that a user is "real" in which case the applicant will have to subscribe to Embloy-Free.

embloyFree.title: What's included in EMBLOY FREE
features: Apply to as many jobs as you want
